articles.description: The inaugural Golden Bachelor Gerry Turner is set to make his television debut on Thursday nights at 8 CT/ 9 EST starting Sept. 28. The show can be streamed on Hulu the next day.
articles.content:
Bachelor Nation fans are about a month away from seeing grandzaddy Gerry Turner on their screens for the first time. 
ABC announced Monday that the Golden Bachelor is set to premiere on Sept. 28 at … [+2258 chars]
